name: AIA_RULE_Operation_ExamineField
description: Expression rule that performs a comparison operation between a field value and a constant
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!parameters: ri!parameters,
  local!instanceMap: ri!parameters.instanceMap,
  local!context: ri!parameters.context,
  local!operator: local!context.ruleOperator,
  local!fieldKey: index(local!context, "fieldKey", null),
  local!fieldValue: index(local!instanceMap, local!fieldKey, null),
  local!compareValue: index(local!context, "value", null),
  local!todos: rule!SHRD_TODO(
    what: "
- Handle tables
- Handle different data types
"
  ),
  rule!AIA_RULE_DynamicBooleanOperation(
    valueOne: local!fieldValue,
    operator: local!operator,
    valueTwo: local!compareValue
  )
)
